content: HL7 AU Base IG http://hl7.org.au/fhir/base2019Feb/index.html and HL7 AU Provider Directory IG http://hl7.org.au/fhir/pd2019Feb/index.html have QA Review Snapshots published today. These roll-up ballot resolutions so far in AU Base (including all prioritised dependent content PD IG relies on) to allow meaningful review by the Secure Messaging Technical Working Group of the PD guide.
